articles.author: Johanna Muliani
articles.title: The James Webb Space Telescope discovers the oldest known black hole - Lifestyle Asia Hong Kong
articles.description: The JWST may have detected the oldest supermassive black hole that researchers have ever found, formed 400 million years after the Big Bang.
articles.content:
The James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) may have detected a supermassive black hole that is the oldest and most distant that researchers have ever found.
The black hole is in the centre of a galaxy kn… [+2258 chars]
